title: WTB or wtt for T206  Charlie Rhodes
author: tab

posts.post_title: WTB or wtt for T206  Charlie Rhodes
posts.post_content:
Looking for t206 Charlie Rhodes with the following backs in any condition

Drum
Cycle 
Sweet cap 350 fac 25

I have a couple graded Rhodes with common backs I could trade and cash to boot.
Also could offer some rare backs to trade for the right condition card

Would also consider upgrading a Tolstoi

Or Rhodes with printer marks, scrap, miscut, double name topps buy back etc
Lionel Carter Rhodes 
Any help would be greatly appreciated


Thanks
Travis

Added a Carolina Brights thanks to a board member.
Still need a couple.

my progress so far. Seeing if these scans will work as far as size. I know the quality is not that great.

Still need Drum,Cycle,,Sweet Cap 350 fac 25
Still looking for Rhodes especially CYCLE back.  Willing to buy or trade

Still looking! If you have or see anything I'm looking for please let me know. I might miss something.

Thanks
